thread.title: Estimation of Winter Snow Operation Performance Measures with Traffic Flow Data, Phase 2
thread.title_full: Estimation of Winter Snow Operation Performance Measures with Traffic Flow Data, Phase 2

title: Estimation of Winter Snow Operation Performance Measures with Traffic Flow Data, Phase 2
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Estimation of Winter Snow Operation Performance Measures with Traffic Flow Data, Phase 2 Text Size: Estimation of Winter Snow Operation Performance Measures with Traffic Flow Data, Phase 2 http://www.dot.state.mn.us/research/TS/2015/201544.pdf 173145 Estimation of Winter Snow Operation Performance Measures with Traffic Flow Data, Phase 2 The Minnesota Department of Transportation has released a report that considers two types of normal condition regain time—average speed density under dry weather conditions for day time, and time-dependent average speed patterns for night time—using traffic flow data for a given snow event.   9/9/2015
